A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The movie sets nothing up\, gets rid of much of what has been previously set up\, leaves Rey as an uninteresting character who is still more powerful than the only villain still alive\, Hux is literally a joke\, there is no character motivation for the enemies\, the movie lacks continuity with both old Star Wars physics and lore as well as basic physics. Finn\, one of the most interesting characters\, is played for laughs\, Phasma comes back impossible and dies immediately. A third of the movie is pointless\, Luke is ruined in a way that is impossible for his character. There is nothing to like here.
